name: CaveScroller
description:
This game runs on mobile! Just enable touch mode in Options. If the game doesn't fit your screen correctly, try "request desktop site".

  • Use WASD/arrow keys (tap on mobile) to move, avoid hitting the cave walls
  • The cave gets harder to move around in as you progress
  • Occasionally spikes and extra lives will appear and fall down
  • The water/lava doesn't hurt you, but don't go too deep down!
  • Impossible level? Press R to generate a new one
  • Press ESC to go to the main menu
  • Made for the raylib 5K gamejam
  • GitHub and more info: https://github.com/gtrxAC/cavescroller
  • Font: IBM PC BIOS 8×8, (c) 2016-2020 VileR
